languages.text: {n}Целитель выхватывает шприц стимулятора и решительно произносит:{/n} "Прошу простить, Ваша Светлость, но мы забираем господина Данрока. Он уже ничего вам не скажет, а каждая секунда промедления может стоить ему жизни".

{n}The medicae officer snatches a syringe of stimulant and speaks decisively:{/n} "Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but we are taking Master Danrok away. He is unable to tell you anything more at present, and every second of delay could cost him his life."
languages.original_text: {n}Целитель выхватывает шприц стимулятора и решительно произносит:{/n} "Прошу простить, Ваша Светлость, но мы забираем господина Данрока. Он уже ничего вам не скажет, а каждая секунда промедления может стоить ему жизни".

traits.locale_text: {n}The healer snatches a syringe of stimulant and speaks decisively:{/n} "Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but we are taking Master Danrok away. He is unable to tell you anything more at present, and every second of delay could cost him his life."

{n}The healer snatches a syringe of stimulant and speaks decisively:{/n} "Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but we are taking Master Danrok away. He is unable to tell you anything more at present, and every second of delay could cost him his life."

{n}The healer snatches a syringe of stimulant and speaks decisively:{/n} "Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but we are taking Master Danrok away. He is unable to tell you anything more at present, and every second of delay could cost him his life."

{n}The medicae officer snatches a syringe of stimulant and speaks decisively:{/n} "Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but we are taking Master Danrok away. He is unable to tell you anything more at present, and every second of delay could cost him his life."

{n}The medicae officer snatches a syringe of stimulant and speaks decisively:{/n} "Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but we are taking Master Danrok away. He is unable to tell you anything more at present, and every second of delay could cost him his life."

{n}The medicae officer snatches a syringe of stimulant and speaks decisively:{/n} "Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but we are taking Master Danrok away. He is unable to tell you anything more at present, and every second of delay could cost him his life."

languages.text: {n}El oficial medicae se lleva una jeringa de estimulante y dice con decisión:{/n} «Lo lamento, mi {mf|lord|lady}, pero nos vamos a llevar al maestro Danrok. No puede decirle nada en su estado y cada segundo que nos demoramos en sanarle podría costarle la vida».
languages.original_text: {n}The medicae officer snatches a syringe of stimulant and speaks decisively:{/n} "Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but we are taking Master Danrok away. He is unable to tell you anything more at present, and every second of delay could cost him his life."

traits.locale_text: {n}El oficial medicae se lleva una jeringa de estimulante y dice con decisión:{/n} «Lo lamento, mi {mf|lord|lady}, pero nos vamos a llevar al maestro Danrok. No puede decirle nada en su estado y cada segundo que nos demoramos en sanarle podría costarle la vida».

languages.text: {n}医務官は興奮剤の入った注射器を奪い取り、決然と話す。{/n}「申し訳ありませんが、ダンロック様を連れて行きます、陛下。今の彼は喋ることが出来ず、一秒でも遅れると、彼は命を落とすことになります」
languages.original_text: {n}The medicae officer snatches a syringe of stimulant and speaks decisively:{/n} "Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but we are taking Master Danrok away. He is unable to tell you anything more at present, and every second of delay could cost him his life."

traits.locale_text: {n}医務官は興奮剤の入った注射器を奪い取り、決然と話す。{/n}「申し訳ありませんが、ダンロック様を連れて行きます、陛下。今の彼は喋ることが出来ず、一秒でも遅れると、彼は命を落とすことになります」

languages.text: {n}医务官抓起一支兴奋剂针筒，果决地开了口。{/n}“抱歉，大人，但我们必须立刻带走丹罗克大师。恐怕他现在没办法告知您更多事情，每耽搁一秒钟，他的性命就危险一分。”
languages.original_text: {n}The medicae officer snatches a syringe of stimulant and speaks decisively:{/n} "Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but we are taking Master Danrok away. He is unable to tell you anything more at present, and every second of delay could cost him his life."

traits.locale_text: {n}医务官抓起一支兴奋剂针筒，果决地开了口。{/n}“抱歉，大人，但我们必须立刻带走丹罗克大师。恐怕他现在没办法告知您更多事情，每耽搁一秒钟，他的性命就危险一分。”

languages.text: {n}Der Medicae-Offizier zückt eine Spritze mit einem Stimulans und erklärt entschlossen:{/n} "Es tut mir leid, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, aber wir bringen Meister Danrok weg. Er kann Euch im Moment nicht mehr sagen, und jede Sekunde, die wir zögern, könnte ihn das Leben kosten."
languages.original_text: {n}The medicae officer snatches a syringe of stimulant and speaks decisively:{/n} "Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but we are taking Master Danrok away. He is unable to tell you anything more at present, and every second of delay could cost him his life."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Medicae-Offizier zückt eine Spritze mit einem Stimulans und erklärt entschlossen:{/n} "Es tut mir leid, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, aber wir bringen Meister Danrok weg. Er kann Euch im Moment nicht mehr sagen, und jede Sekunde, die wir zögern, könnte ihn das Leben kosten."

languages.text: {n}L'officier de medicae saisit une seringue de stimulant et déclare sur un ton décisif :{/n} « Mes excuses, Votre Seigneurie, mais nous devons emmener maître Danrok. Il est incapable de vous en dire plus pour le moment, et chaque seconde perdue pourrait lui coûter la vie. »
languages.original_text: {n}The medicae officer snatches a syringe of stimulant and speaks decisively:{/n} "Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but we are taking Master Danrok away. He is unable to tell you anything more at present, and every second of delay could cost him his life."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'officier de medicae saisit une seringue de stimulant et déclare sur un ton décisif :{/n} « Mes excuses, Votre Seigneurie, mais nous devons emmener maître Danrok. Il est incapable de vous en dire plus pour le moment, et chaque seconde perdue pourrait lui coûter la vie. »

languages.text: {n}Sıhhiye subayı, uyarıcı içeren bir şırınga çıkarıyor ve belli etmeden konuşuyor.{/n} "Özür diliyorum {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri ancak Üstat Danrok'u götürmemiz gerek. Şu anda size daha fazla şey söyleyebilecek durumda değil ve boşa geçirdiğimiz her saniye yaşamına mal olabilir."
languages.original_text: {n}The medicae officer snatches a syringe of stimulant and speaks decisively:{/n} "Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but we are taking Master Danrok away. He is unable to tell you anything more at present, and every second of delay could cost him his life."
